name: The Void Rains Upon Her Heart
description: Control the heart of an alien girl and battle tough bosses in this Bullet-hell, Shoot-em-up with some rogue-lite elements. Love your way through randomly chosen boss battles leading up to a final battle. Each defeated monster will give her gifts that power up her heart. Don't let her heart break!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 64bit compatible Dual Core CPU Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: DX11 compliant graphics card DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 200 MB available space
